GSD.description:
ax25: improve the incomplete fix to avoid UAF and NPD bugs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.268 by commit a509dbde35fa51d140512cbcf50068a84fdb7aad. For more details please see the references link.
